author: Staff Reporter
text:
Additional District Judge V. Sampathkumar sentenced a man to life imprisonment for murdering his mother in an inebriated condition in 2014.

The prosecution case was that Mohan (31), of Agaram village in Rasipuram, was a cleaner of a school vehicle. Mohan in an inebriated condition frequently argued with his mother Logambal for his marriage. On August 19, 2014, he argued with Logambal and assaulted her with a sickle. She suffered head injuries and died on the spot. The Rasipuram police registered a case and arrested Mohan. The judge sentenced him to undergo life imprisonment and imposed a fine of Rs. 1,000 on him. Later, he was lodged at Coimbatore Central Prison.
title: Man sentenced to life for murder
